com.viaoa.comm.discovery

Class DiscoveryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.comm.discovery.DiscoveryClient

  • public class DiscoveryClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by clients to be able to find all available discoveryServers.
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    DiscoveryServer

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscoveryClient

        public DiscoveryClient(int serverPort,
               int clientPort)
        Parameters:
        serverPort - port that server will send udp broadcast messages "here I am" on.
        clientPort - port that clients will send broadcast message "where are you" to servers.
